TextView.android:text: Welcome to Barada! If you haven't already done so, you need to get Barada credentials for your account on a server you're trying to access. If you manage the server yourself, see http://barada.sourceforge.net for information on downloading and installing a Barada PAM module. Once Barada is configured, or if you're trying to access an account that already has Barada support, you simply need to create a profile for that account with the 128bit Barada key configured on the server. Accessing that profile using Barada's two-factor authentication will then be as simple as entering your PIN.
